summary.span: 在 Web 页上显示超链接样式按钮控件。

span.span: Displays a hyperlink-style button control on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [LinkButton 控件和验证LinkButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用 控件在网页上创建超链接样式的按钮。Use the control to create a hyperlink-style button on the Web page. 控件与控件具有相同的外观 ，但具有与控件相同的功能 。The control has the same appearance as a control, but has the same functionality as a control. 如果要在单击控件时链接到其他网页，请考虑使用 控件。If you want to link to another Web page when the control is clicked, consider using the control. > [!NOTE] > 控件将 JavaScript 呈现给客户端浏览器。The control renders JavaScript to the client browser. 为了使此控件正常运行，客户端浏览器必须启用 JavaScript。The client browser must have JavaScript enabled for this control to function properly. 有关客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 网页中的客户端脚本](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100))。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/3hc29e2a(v=vs.100)). 你可以创建 "提交" 按钮或 "命令" 按钮。You can create either a Submit button or a Command button. "提交" 按钮没有关联的命令名称。A Submit button does not have a command name associated with it. 此按钮只是将网页发布回服务器。The button simply posts the Web page back to the server. 默认情况下， 控件是 "提交" 按钮。By default, a control is a Submit button. 您可以为事件提供事件处理程序 ，以编程方式控制在单击 "提交" 按钮时执行的操作。You can provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the actions performed when the Submit button is clicked. 另一方面，命令按钮具有与按钮关联的命令名，如 `Sort` 。On the other hand, a Command button has a command name associated with the button, such as `Sort`. 设置 属性以指定命令名称。Set the property to specify the command name. 这允许您在网页上创建多个 控件，并以编程方式确定单击了哪个 控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. 还可以将 属性与命令按钮一起使用，以提供有关要执行的命令的其他信息，例如指定升序顺序。You can also use the property with a Command button to provide additional information about the command to perform, such as specifying ascending order. 还可以提供事件的事件处理程序 ，以编程方式控制单击命令按钮时执行的操作。You can also provide an event handler for the event to programmatically control the action performed when the Command button is clicked. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 文本在控件中显示之前未经过 HTML 编码 。Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the control. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## LinkButton 控件和验证LinkButton Controls and Validation 默认情况下，在单击控件时将执行页验证 。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要防止页验证发生，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目： [下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192872). 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件在 单击链接时在控件中显示文本。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that displays text in a control when the link is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以使 列表项文本始终显示为粗体。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control, so that the list item text always appears bold. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法 ，以便它将 text 属性设置为分析对象的 text 属性，如果已分析的对象是对象，则为; 否则为空字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it either sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a object, or to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLinkButtonAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_linkbutton_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CausesValidation { get; set; }
.property instance bool CausesValidation
Public Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CausesValidation : bool with get, set
public virtual bool CausesValidation { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在单击控件时将执行页验证 。By default, page validation is performed when a control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 通过使用属性，可以指定 (或) 确定在单击控件时是否同时在客户端和服务器上执行验证 。You can specify (or determine) whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false` 。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常设置为， `false` 用于重置或清除按钮，以防止在单击按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 当属性的值 设置为时 `true` ，还可以使用 属性来指定该控件对其进行验证的验证组的名称 。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来防止页验证发生。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意该 方法独立激活每个验证控件的方式。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/CS/linkbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButtonCausesValidation/VB/linkbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击该控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当没有与控件关联的命令名时，通常使用此事件 ，就像 "提交" 按钮的情况一样。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序， 以便在单击控件时显示一条消息 。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command;
.event class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler Command
Public Custom Event Command As CommandEventHandler
public: event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;
member this.Command : System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventHandler
public: virtual event System::Web::UI::WebControls::CommandEventHandler ^ Command;

summary.span: 在单击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击该控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当命令名称（如 `Sort` ）与控件相关联时，通常使用此事件 。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这允许您在网页上创建多个 控件，并以编程方式确定单击了哪个 控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 该 事件通过的形式由控件层次结构引发 `BubbleEvent` 。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序， 以便在单击控件时显示一条消息 。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public string CommandArgument { get; set; }
.property instance string CommandArgument
Public Property CommandArgument As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandArgument { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CommandArgument : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与关联的 属性一起传递到 事件处理程序的可选参数。

span.span: Gets or sets an optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.

value.span: 一个可选参数，与关联的 属性一起传递到 事件处理程序。

span.span: An optional argument passed to the event handler along with the associated property.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定补充属性的参数 。Use the property to specify an argument that complements the property. > [!NOTE] > 通常仅当设置属性时才使用属性 。The property is typically only used when the property is set. 属性 通过允许提供有关要执行的命令的任何其他信息，来补充属性。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide any additional information about the command to perform. 例如，可以将 属性设置为， `Sort` 并将属性设置 为， `Ascending` 以指定要按升序排序的命令。For example, you can set the property to `Sort` and set the property to `Ascending` to specify a command to sort in ascending order. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定一个可选参数，该参数对控件的命令名称进行补充 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an optional argument that complements the command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public string CommandName { get; set; }
.property instance string CommandName
Public Property CommandName As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CommandName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与 控件关联的命令名。

span.span: Gets or sets the command name associated with the control.

summary.span: 此值与 属性一起传递到 事件处理程序。

span.span: This value is passed to the event handler along with the property.
The command name of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果网页上有多个 控件，请使用 属性来指定或确定与所单击控件关联的命令名 。When you have multiple controls on a Web page, use the property to specify or determine the command name associated with the control clicked. 可以将属性设置为 任何标识要执行的命令的字符串。You can set the property with any string that identifies the command to perform. 然后，可以通过编程方式确定控件的命令名称 并执行适当的操作。You can then programmatically determine the command name of the control and perform the appropriate actions. 可以通过使用属性来指定有关命令的其他信息，例如 `Ascending` 排序顺序 。Additional information about the command, such as an `Ascending` sort order, can be specified by using the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性为控件指定命令名 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a command name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions GetPostBackOptions() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetPostBackOptions () As PostBackOptions
protected: virtual System::Web::UI::PostBackOptions ^ GetPostBackOptions();
abstract member GetPostBackOptions : unit -> System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions override this.GetPostBackOptions : unit -> System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions

summary.span: 创建表示 控件的回发行为的 对象。

span.span: Creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior.

returns.span: 一个表示 控件的回发行为的 。

span.span: A that represents the control's postback behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个 表示 控件的回发行为的对象。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 然后，通常将对象传递给 方法，该方法用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，在调用该函数时，会导致服务器回发到页面。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to post back to the page. 此方法主要由控件开发人员在扩展类时使用 。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 你可以 在派生类中重写方法，以修改按钮控件的回发选项，或在单击按钮时调用客户端脚本。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 请确保调用基类的 方法，以便设置标准回发选项。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

related.span: ASP.NET 网页中的客户端脚本

span.span: Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnClick(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnClick (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnClick(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnClick : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnClick : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击该控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当没有与控件关联的命令名时，通常使用此事件 ，就像 "提交" 按钮的情况一样。This event is commonly used when no command name is associated with the control, as in the case of a Submit button. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序， 以显示单击哪个 控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: Gets or sets the client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

value.span: 在引发某个 控件的 事件时所执行的客户端脚本。

span.span: The client-side script that executes when a control's event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定 引发控件的事件时执行的其他客户端脚本 。Use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when the control's event is raised. 为此属性指定的脚本将 在控件的属性中呈现， `OnClick` 以及控件的预定义的客户端脚本。The script that you specify for this property is rendered in the control's `OnClick` attribute in addition to the control's predefined client-side script. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定在单击控件时执行的其他客户端脚本 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify additional client-side script that executes when a control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/CS/linkbutton.onclientclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.OnClientClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.OnClientClick/VB/linkbutton.onclientclickvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击该控件时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 当命令名称（如 `Sort` ）与控件相关联时，通常使用此事件 。This event is commonly used when a command name, such as `Sort`, is associated with the control. 这允许您在网页上创建多个 控件，并以编程方式确定单击了哪个 控件。This allows you to create multiple controls on a Web page and programmatically determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 该 事件通过的形式由控件层次结构引发 `BubbleEvent` 。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序， 以显示单击哪个 控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display which control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时从当前页发送到的网页的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the Web page to post to from the current page when the control is clicked.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您使用控件执行跨页面发布 。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 在 单击控件时，将属性设置为要发布到的网页的 URL 。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定 Page2 会导致包含控件的页面 发布到 `Page2.aspx` 。For example, specifying Page2.aspx causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果没有为属性指定值 ，则页面回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用带有服务器端验证的控件执行跨页面回发时，应检查页面的 属性是否在 `true` 处理回发之前。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页面回发，要检查的页面是 PreviousPage。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 以下 Visual Basic 代码演示了如何执行此操作：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页面发布技术的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web Forms 中的跨页面发布](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100))。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178139(v=vs.100)). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来执行跨页面的 post。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击控件时 ，该页将在文本框中输入的值发送到属性指定的目标页 。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，还必须在与此代码示例相同的目录中为目标页创建一个文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 下一个示例中提供了目标页的代码。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性 访问使用属性从另一页发送的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取从上一页发送的字符串，并将其显示给用户。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果尝试直接运行此代码示例，则将收到错误，因为该字段的值 `text` 将为 `null` 。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `text` field will be `null`. 相反，请使用此代码创建一个目标页，并将该文件放在与上一个示例的代码相同的目录中。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 文件的名称必须与 上一示例中为属性指定的值相对应。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 运行上一示例中的代码时，此页将在发生跨页面发送时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/linkbutton.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在 控件上的文本标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the text caption displayed on the control.

value.span: 显示在 控件上的文本标题。

span.span: The text caption displayed on the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定要在控件上显示的标题 。Use the property to specify or determine the caption to display on the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [验证服务器控制语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定显示在控件上的标题 。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption that appears on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic LinkButton.CommandName Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 按钮 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: Button Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性来指定在 控件回发到服务器时，控件引发验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当属性的值设置为时，此属性才有效 `true` 。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为属性指定值，则 当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指定在 控件回发到服务器时要验证的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls that are to be validated when a control posts back to the server. 此页包含三个文本框，用于捕获用户的数据和三个 控件，以确保用户不会将文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 前两个文本框的控件位于 `PersonalInfoGroup` 验证组中， 第三个文本框的控件位于 `LocationInfoGroup` 验证组中。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. `LinkButton1`单击时，只会验证验证组中的控件 `PersonalInfoGroup` 。When `LinkButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. `LinkButton2`单击时，只验证验证组中的控件 `LocationInfoGroup` 。When `LinkButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/CS/linkbutton.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LinkButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LinkButton.ValidationGroup/VB/linkbutton.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
